text: The men's 1 km time trial event at the 1980 Summer Olympics took place on 22 July 1980 in Moscow Olympic Velodrome. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" |- !Rank !Cyclist !Nation !Time |- | 1 || Lothar Thoms || ||1:02.955 WR, OR |- | 2 || Aleksandr Panfilov || ||1:04.845 |- | 3 || David Weller || ||1:05.241 |- | 4 || Guido Bontempi || ||1:05.478 |- | 5 || Yavé Cahard || ||1:05.584 |- | 6 || Heinz Isler || ||1:06.263 |- | 7 || Petr Kocek || ||1:06.368 |- | 8 || Bjarne Sørensen || ||1:07.422 |- | 9 || Terrence Tinsley || ||1:07.542 |- | 10 || Kenrick Tucker || ||1:07.709 |- | 11 || Andrzej Michalak || ||1:07.891 |- | 12 || Stoyan Petrov || ||1:08.682 |- | 13 || Jan Blomme || ||1:09.015 |- | 14 || Errol McLean || ||1:09.991 |- | 15 || Hans Fischer || ||1:10.801 |- | 16 || Esteban Espinosa || ||1:11.419 |- | 17 || Khalid Shebani || ||1:11.627 |- | 18 || John Musa || ||1:15.779 |- | 19 || Patrick Wackström || || NP |} ==References== Category:Track cycling at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Cycling at the 1980 Summer Olympics – Men's 1 km time trial
